delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete the following realm?
delete.title: Delete realm

displayName.label: Display name
displayName.placeholder: Enter the display name of the realm

secret.label: Secret
secret.placeholder: Paste a JWT secret in the input or leave it empty to securely generate a new secret
secret.warning: Changing the secret will invalidate all active tokens. Press the button below to revert the change.

requireConfirmedAccount.help: By enabling this setting, a confirmed email address or phone number will be required for users to sign-in and manage their account.
requireConfirmedAccount.label: Require confirmed account

requireUniqueEmail.help: By enabling this setting, email address uniqueness will be enforced upon user creation & update.
requireUniqueEmail.label: Require unique email address

uniqueName.conflict: This alias is already used by another realm.
uniqueName.forbidden: The unique name 'portal' cannot be used.
uniqueName.label: Unique name (alias)

url.label: Application URL
url.placeholder: Enter the web address (URL) of the application corresponding to this realm

allowedCharacters.label: Allowed characters
allowedCharacters.placeholder: Enter all the characters allowed for usernames (e.g.: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-._@+)
